lever_pancreas.description: Patient was treated for liver (0) or pancreas (1)

lever_operatie.description: Indicates what was resected in the liver (resection type)

values.Wigresectie: Wedge resection in the liver, i.e., resection of a triangular piece of liver that is not tied to anatomical liver segment boundaries
values.Hemihepatectomie: Resection of an entire half of the liver. Right-hemihepatectomy = V, VI, VII and VIII (sometimes also IVb). Left-hemihepatectomy = II, III and IV

soort_operatie_lever.description: Indicates what type of procedure was performed on the liver

values.Niet van toepassing: Not applicable. Why? Perhaps the liver tumor is not treatable surgically but requires chemo

ablatie.description: Indicates what type of ablation was performed

resectie.description: Indicates what type of resection was performed

values.Laparoscopisch met conversie: Laparoscopic, then converted to open procedure
values.Robot met conversie naar laparoscopie: Robotic procedure, then converted to laparoscopy
values.Robot met conversie naar open: Robotic procedure, then converted to open procedure
